评论详情: I am so obsessed with this crop tee!!! I wish I owned 7 of them because I could wear them every single day of the week! Not only does it look amazing, it is perfect for the gym. It has a decent amount of stretch but also really holds you in. You can wear with or without a sports bra underneath. I have worn this out shopping and it looks like just a really cute cropped shirt. I just love it!

i love using this top for casual wear as well as working out. it’s simple and cute so it’s goes with everything my go to when using this top is my jeggings or a skirt. it is fitted but not at all tight you can’t really feel it when wearing. i think if you want a more looser feel size up but if you are fine with it fitted get your regular size. it’s breathable and comfortable to wear. easy to just throw on as well.

I love the material used for this cropped top. It's sooo soft and very stretchy. Like most things Pavoi, you should consider sizing up. I'm generally a small, but have to size up to a medium in Pavoi. That being said, this crop top is still very very short. My bras are always playing peekaboo when I wear it. It's not the end of the world, but I have to pick and choose when I want to wear it.

It is cropped! A lot shorter than in the picture and I’m a part of the itty bitty titty committee. It is insanely comfortable and works like a dream for layers. True to size but I would’ve liked it to not sit directly under where it shows the band of my bra.
Really soft! I wish it is a little less cropped, but just my preference. Love the blue color!

This material is more like a bathing suit. It looks very sporty. It is soft and comfortable. My daughter is 140 lb. 5 ft 5 and this fit her just like the photo shows. The fabric is breathable and tsoft. The fit is more like a stretchy soft texture.

this shirt is soooo comfy! Its stretchy enough to fit my curvy top and give the perfect amount of support that i need. it is very flattering compared to most cropped t's i have. very soft fabric, well made and washes well.

评论概述: Love it, but it's suuuuper stretchy, jsyk.
评论详情: I have a love-hate relationship with this brand lol. I've had issues with sizing regarding PAVOI's clothes & jewelry, where some shirts have run super small and leggings have been crazily loose despite my use of size charts. I'm a 36DD 135 lbs and typically struggle with choosing a size small vs. an extra small when it comes to PAVOI's active tops. I got this in a small, and it basically fits like a rash guard or an extensive sports bra, and I love it. It's crazily soft and it's not restrictive, even around the ribs. If anything, it's actually too loose and I should've gotten the smallest size available. But, it's still wearable as it is. Not transparent (in black, at least), it's definitely thin though, so it's not exactly a 'braless' top, unless you have a smaller chest - literally zero support. It's also not for arm day, unless you're smaller chested lol. If you lift your arms and you're bigger than a B cup, you're probably gonna see underboob. I only gave four stars though because PAVOI's active tops seem to have a chronic shoulder issue where, no matter what, the shoulders kind of bunch up at the seams and look bulky even when the rest of the shirt fits perfectly. It's weird, nothing life-ruining, but I'm hoping it's maybe an aspect of design that can be improved in the future.
These fit great and are so comfortable and cute! Fit as expected.

Found my favorite jewelry brand on Amazon selling apparel, too, so had to try. I usually wear smalls or mediums depending on the style. I ordered medium for this one and it's still quite tiny and short. It's got stretchy material and it might shrink even further after wash. I'd definitely recommend to size up. Maybe two sizes up. It's really pretty and trendy I'm sure, however, since it's so small, I'm not sure if I can pull it off comfortably. I'll try and see this summer!
I love the buttery fabric used for this top and the color is so beautiful. It’s a bit shorter of a crop than I was expecting but it’s very cute and still gives good coverage. Pretty sweatproof too

This workout top from PAVOI is super soft. I just didn’t like how the sleeves aren’t fitted like I like. The neckline was also kinda tight to put on and the shoulder area fits weird. It’s cropped but doesn’t show your business when working out. But overall, nice and comfortable material.
This top is nice and comfortable. It’s great for being active or for lounging. Its a pretty basic top.

The color was beautiful and so is the fabric. This felt really nice on the skin. I did order a size large to accommodate for my chest, but it’s still ended up a little Shorter than I expected I’m usually a medium but wanted a little bit more length. I’m still going to wear it and I love the material and it felt good on so maybe not big chested

评论概述: Small in size, but good quality material
评论详情: I typically wear a large or extra large. I bought this in hopes I could wear it with leggings to the gym. It's a little out of my comfort zone as a crop top, but YOLO.  The material is really nice, it fit in the shoulders, but the crop wasn't cropped enough, it stopped right below my bra. I don't know if it's a true XL, but maybe size up from what you normally wear if you purchase this top. If it had fit properly it would have been the perfect top. Love the style.

As always Pavoi makes another outstanding workout top.  I'm 5'3, 145lbs, and wear a 34DDD, so I ordered a Large and it fits well.  This top is more cropped than I am use to, but I was expecting that.  The material is buttery soft.  This top is made well, great quality.  Highly recommend.
the material on the top is so buttery. feels so comfortable. however, it is waaaay too cropped. I wear a 40DDD and this did not cover my entire breast.

It is very nice, a basic that matches with almost any outfit. I love to wear it with high waist pants combined with a jacket. The size is good, I normally order M. Black always saves any outfit. I recommend it.
This top is made out of an ultra soft, smooth fabric and feels good quality. It's true to size and quite cropped, so keep that in mind if you don't like super high crop tops.
Great cut with buttery fabric. As described and great for working out. True to size. Neck is a little tight putting on but it's worth it, don't care. 5' 100lbs.

This is a cute crop top. My daughter wears an XS and it is often difficult to find. We were happy that this top came in XS and it fits her well. It runs a bit shorter than most styles, but she likes it. The quality is nice. It is a thicker material, so it doesn't appear to be thin and clingy, which is nice. The blue color is a nice, muted, smokey blue. Overall, very happy with this top.
The material is really nice and comfortable. Fits true to size. Great quality and price.
The color is beautiful, and the shirt is very comfortable. Nice material, fits well

评论概述: A little more cropped than I expected
评论详情: This crop top is definitely shorter than I expected, but I still like it! I knew it would be cropped but I didn't think it would basically fit like a bra lol. Length notwithstanding, this shirt is INCREDIBLY soft and smooth and VERY comfortable. I've come to expect quality from Pavoi and their new workout line is no exception. I'm looking forward to wearing this at the gym and around the house!
Nice material, correct fit, but it is SUPER short- barely covers the chest (and I have a small bust)
My daughter loves the look and feel of this crop top. She generally wears XS and this fit her well. It’s well made and the material is super soft and comfortable.
I just really love this brand. This shirt is very stretchy comfortable and soft.It fits true to size and is cropped, I love how it looks and feels.

* Athleisure Crop Tee | Low Support Crew Neck Short Cap Sleeves Lounge Workout Women's Cropped Top | LuxeCloud *  I wear a size 34a I’m 5’10 125lbs so I ordered the size small. The fabric is super soft and comfortable. Provides a good amount of support while also being stretchy and comfortable. The issue I have is it fits perfectly around my shoulders, arms, etc. but it’s extremely short. Like the bottom of the top sits where my bra band regularly does. It’ll make a great top to sleep in but far too short to wear out and about

Cropped is one thing but I can’t even raise my arms a little bit or my bra will show. Not good for workouts. Top does feel nice and I like the color. Pretty useless you since I can’t move if I have of on lol
